Package com.gsm.service.impl

Class TrimServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.impl.TrimServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrimService
    @Service
public class TrimServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrimService
    The concrete implementation of the TrimService interface. This class orchestrates all business logic for the Trim feature.

      • save

        @Transactional
public TrimDto save​(TrimDto dto)
        Saves a new trim or updates an existing one. This method now uses an intelligent synchronization strategy for variants, consistent with other services. It correctly handles updates, additions, and deletions.
        Specified by:
        save in interface TrimService
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO containing the trim data to be saved.
        Returns:
        The saved TrimDto, including any database-generated values like IDs.
